slides.subTitle: Now it's easier to get what you need! from the U.S. with
slides.headline: My Cargo US
slides.description: We give you peace of mind while shopping for your favorite items from home without the hassle or worry of import taxes or duty rates.

slides.subTitle: Shop now and get up to 50% in savings
slides.headline:
Ordering is
quick & easy
slides.description: Find these item on Amazon!, request repackage and schedule your delivery! We offer package inspection on our locations, so you never have to worry about not getting what you ordered.

slides.subTitle: There's no job too big or small for us!
slides.headline: We have the solution!
slides.description: We use the latest equipment and have years of experience, so your items are in good hands when they're with us. So give us a call and let us take care of that next big move for you.
